document.full_text: when the regular session of the texas legislature ended on monday, most key immigration legislation was left dead, including a proposal championed by republican governor rick perry that sought to crack down on cities that provide sanctuary to illegal immigrants.
document.title: immigration proposal that died in texas could get second life
lines_and_colors: when the regular session of the texas legislature ended on monday, most key immigration legislation was left dead, including a proposal championed by republican governor rick perry that sought to crack down on cities that provide sanctuary to illegal immigrants.
